Text: As a result of SoftBank's ascent, particularly its impact on the burgeoning Japanese internet, Son gradually became a household name in Japan. His rags-to-riches life story - Forbes puts Son's net worth at over $20 billion - has given him a celebrity status his famed charisma only serves to enhance.
Cause: As a result of SoftBank's ascent, particularly its impact on the burgeoning Japanese internet, Son gradually became a household name in Japan.
Effect: His rags-to-riches life story - Forbes puts Son's net worth at over $20 billion - has given him a celebrity status his famed charisma only serves to enhance.
Sentence: <e1>As a result of SoftBank's ascent, particularly its impact on the burgeoning Japanese internet, Son gradually became a household name in Japan.</e1> <e2>His rags-to-riches life story - Forbes puts Son's net worth at over $20 billion - has given him a celebrity status his famed charisma only serves to enhance.</e2>
